DatasetCreate.title: DatasetCreate
DatasetCreate.description:
Schema for creating a new dataset.

Inherits all fields from DatasetBase without additional
fields for dataset creation requests.

name.title: Name
name.description: Dataset name (alphanumeric, spaces, hyphens, underscores only)

description.title: Description
examples: A collection of animal photos for ML training

max_images.title: Max Images
max_images.description: Maximum number of images to collect

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: Project ID (uses user's default project if not provided)

download_url.title: Download Url
download_url.description: Download URL when dataset is completed

DatasetResponse.title: DatasetResponse
DatasetResponse.description:
Schema for dataset response data.

Includes all dataset information returned by the API,
with processing status and progress tracking.

Attributes:
    id: Unique dataset identifier
    user_id: Owner user identifier
    status: Current processing status
    progress: Processing progress percentage (0-100)
    images_collected: Number of images successfully collected
    download_url: Download URL when dataset is completed
    error_message: Error message if processing failed

total_datasets.title: Total Datasets
total_datasets.description: Total number of datasets in the system

total_images.title: Total Images
total_images.description: Total number of images collected across all datasets

DatasetStats.title: DatasetStats
DatasetStats.description:
Dataset statistics schema.

Provides aggregate statistics about datasets in the system
for dashboard and reporting purposes.

Attributes:
    total_datasets: Total number of datasets in the system
    completed_datasets: Number of successfully completed datasets
    processing_datasets: Number of currently processing datasets
    failed_datasets: Number of failed datasets
    total_images: Total number of images collected across all datasets

DatasetStatus.title: DatasetStatus
DatasetStatus.description:
Dataset processing status enumeration.

Defines all possible states of a dataset during its lifecycle
from creation to completion or failure.

Values:
    PENDING: Dataset created but not yet started
    PROCESSING: Dataset generation in progress
    COMPLETED: Dataset generation completed successfully
    FAILED: Dataset generation failed with errors
    CANCELLED: Dataset generation cancelled by user

DatasetUpdate.title: DatasetUpdate
DatasetUpdate.description:
Schema for updating dataset information.

All fields are optional to support partial updates.
Only metadata fields can be updated, not processing parameters.

Attributes:
    name: Updated dataset name
    description: Updated dataset description

HealthCheck.title: HealthCheck
HealthCheck.description:
Health check response schema.

Provides information about the service health status
and basic service metadata.

Attributes:
    status: Service status indicator
    timestamp: Check timestamp
    version: API version
    environment: Environment name

JobLogEntry.title: JobLogEntry
JobLogEntry.description: Schema for a single job log entry.

task_ids.title: Task Ids
task_ids.description: List of Celery task IDs dispatched

JobStartResponse.title: JobStartResponse
JobStartResponse.description: Schema for job start endpoint response.

JobStopResponse.title: JobStopResponse
JobStopResponse.description: Schema for job stop endpoint response.

Schema for profile synchronization response.

Contains the result of profile sync operation.

description.title: Description

ProjectListResponse.title: ProjectListResponse
ProjectListResponse.description: Schema for list of projects response.

description.title: Description
examples: Dataset for classifying different animal species

SearchEngine.title: SearchEngine
SearchEngine.description:
Supported search engines enumeration.

Defines all search engines available for image collection
in the dataset generation process.

Values:
    GOOGLE: Google Images search
    BING: Bing Images search
    BAIDU: Baidu Images search
    DUCKDUCKGO: DuckDuckGo Images search

StorageUsageResponse.title: StorageUsageResponse
StorageUsageResponse.description: Response model for storage usage statistics.

TokenResponse.title: TokenResponse
TokenResponse.description:
Schema for authentication token response.

Contains JWT tokens and metadata returned after successful authentication.

Attributes:
    access_token: JWT access token for API authentication
    refresh_token: JWT refresh token for token renewal
    token_type: Token type (always "bearer")
    expires_in: Token expiration time in seconds

user.title: User
user.description: User information if token is valid

TokenVerificationResponse.title: TokenVerificationResponse
TokenVerificationResponse.description:
Schema for token verification response.

Contains validation result and user information if token is valid.

Attributes:
    valid: Whether the token is valid
    user: User information if token is valid

full_name.title: Full Name
full_name.description: User full name (letters, spaces, hyphens, dots, apostrophes only)

password.title: Password
password.description: User password (minimum 8 characters, must contain uppercase, lowercase, digit, and special character)

UserCreate.title: UserCreate
UserCreate.description:
Schema for creating a new user account.

Extends UserBase with password field for user registration.

Attributes:
    password: User password with strength requirements

UserLogin.title: UserLogin
UserLogin.description:
Schema for user authentication.

Contains credentials required for user login.

Attributes:
    email: User email address
    password: User password

full_name.title: Full Name
full_name.description: User full name (letters, spaces, hyphens, dots, apostrophes only)

UserResponse.title: UserResponse
UserResponse.description:
Schema for user response data.

Includes all user information returned by the API,
with timestamps for audit trails.

Attributes:
    id: Unique user identifier

UserUpdate.title: UserUpdate
UserUpdate.description:
Schema for updating user information.

All fields are optional to support partial updates.

Attributes:
    full_name: Updated user full name
    is_active: Updated user active status
